title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather app to get current weather conditions and a 5-day forecast anywhere in the world!

title: Meal Prep
description: This meal planner gets a calculated daily calorie goal, then gives you the option to search for different foods to meet those goals. This was a collaborative group project.

title: Stack 'em Back Blog
description: This is a basic blog site where you can log in and add, delete, or update blog entries, and add or delete comments.
